title: Tritheism charged upon Dr. Sherlock's new notion of the Trinity and the charge made good in an answer to the defense of the said notion against the Animadversions upon Dr. Sherlock's book, entituled, A vindication of the holy and ever-blessed Trinity, &c. / by a divine of the Church of England.
author: South, Robert, 1634-1716.
notes: Written by Robert South.  Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
